name: Railway to Heaven
description:
The world has been invaded by cosmic horrors that have destroyed everything in their path. You are part of a group of four survivors on a journey to one of the few safe places left, but one of you might not be who you think he is.

You have to keep the engine running. Get coal from the coal storage area and place it in the engine.

You have to eat as well, so make sure you get some food from the fridge and cook it on the stove

One of you will be a traitor. The traitor can sabotage all equipment, use the radio to change course and increase the travel time, or use the ladder to get on top of the train.

If you find the traitor, you should send him to prison

One of the players has to host the game.

The others have to connect to the server using the host ip. You can play LAN or you can use a VPN like Hamachi or Radmin.

Advanced users can also use port forward. The port is 7777.
